entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Request to back port fix into .NET 7 #17921
  • VS 2022 Preview RC1 with Net Maui 8 Does Not Install Correctly #17919
  • Shadow on Label disappears permanently and won't come back if Label opacity is ever tweened down to zero #17916
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: You cannot start a load for a destroyed activity #17915
  • Impossible to run any UnitTest on MAUI #17914
  • maui dev ，in android window is ok ,in ios webview <img src=x.png 。not display ,but use remote url is ok ,why ? #17912
  • Adding +/- sign to numeric entry to allow negative inputs for iOS #17911
  • Windows .NET MAUI App throws Exception when closing second window #17909
  • Maui app under iOS 17.0.3 not working crash #17908
  • [iOS] .net8 MAUI CollectionView very laggy inside a grid and one row is set to "Auto" #17900
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Entry.Keyboard == null regression #17899
  • AppThemeBinding interfering with VisualState setters for FlyoutItems #17898
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]The Editor does not display the string 'aBcDeFg' exactly for D4. #17897
  • Grid ColumnDefinitions not updating #17894
  • SecurityStorage nullability or docs are wrong #17893

Closed

  • App crash on button click in CollectionView Item #17707
  • Can not run NetMAU app build with net8 on a device with iOS 12 #17913
  • Adequate team size and financial commitment from Microsoft to fix the >2500 bugs (& growing) in MAUI (or at least get the most basic core functions like Border/Editor/Image/Layout working) #17910
  • Where/how to indicate Win platform already use PublishReadyToRun #17905
  • Another Text Color issue #17818
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] D11 text should be displayed as 'bold'/'italic' #17896
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button FontAttributes not working #12053
    Backlog
  • [ManualMauiTests] [D11] Editor font attributes do not seem to take affect #17785
  • IOS App Icon no change after publishing #17764

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Make sure to not call new APIs on old iOS #17907
    .NET 8 GA
  • Merge net8 to main #17906
  • [net8.0] Update to rtm versions #17904
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix issue using Connectivity from a background thread #17903
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration

Merged

  • Work around the dotnet tool restore issues #17878

Updated

  • Dev/scoban/getridofxamuit #17849
    area/testing
  • Fix 17776 #17796
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 GA
  • Limit star expansion when measuring/arranging at constrained sizes #17880
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR1
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR2
  • API Doc improvements to fix online browser warnings #17732
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Correct InputView.MaxLengthProperty declaring type #17788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Reverting default item and globbing updates #17853
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Ensure that the navigation page renderer measures its current Page #17164
    area/navigation 🧭, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • [X] revert #5611 #17733
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
  • [net8.0] Reverting default item and globbing updates #17852
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
